image.altText: Woman sits and looks at the camera with black background

props.synopsis: Hundreds of people shared personal stories with South Australia's royal commission into domestic, family and sexual violence. They hope it with lead to change. Warning: This story contains themes of sexual assault and domestic violence.

title.children: Domestic and sexual violence victims hopeful for change as royal commission findings set to be released

image.altText: Defeated SA Best leader Nick Xenophon with his successful candidates.

props.synopsis: Independent-turn-Liberal Frank Pangallo has styled himself as "the watchdog" in the lead-up to the 2026 state election, but time will tell if the gamble pays off, writes Daniel Keane.

title.children: Will a former journalist help the Liberals recapture this 'blue ribbon' seat?

image.altText: Brayden Maynard grapples with Izak Rankine

image.altText: Santos sign

image.altText: Nasiah Wanganeen-Milera celebrates a goal
